paragraph: No one member is capable of creating such an ambitious project on their own. UMEB members thrive in the pursuit of over 11 different majors across an array of different colleges and apply the knowledge they learn from said classes on our boat.
No idea is a bad idea. UMEB is a safe place to take risks and fully unleash one's creativity. We offer a chance for members to apply their theoretical skills to an actual project. Of course
column4: with a chance to add their own twist of creativity as well.

paragraph: UMEB does not settle for less. As such
column5: and our timeline is tight. We often face many setbacks
column6: but we remain undeterred. Adaptability is an integral part of who we are
column7: and it allows us to strive for greatness. We were founded in the uncertain times that were the pandemic
column8: but have grown to what we are today.

paragraph: We are committed to carbon-neutrality. This commitment to sustainability is deep-seated in UMEB's mission. Our vessels are charged with solar energy
column4: decreasing our reliance on fossil fuels.
